title: Chad Johnson’s Resumé
text:
Data Science Student | Accounting Professional

chadjohnson31901@gmail.com | LinkedIn | GitHub





Eastern University | Oct 2024 - Present



Brigham Young University-Idaho | Sep 2021 - Jul 2024 - Data Science Society Member - Student Accounting Society Member






Remote | Oct 2024 - Present - Manage a small bookkeeping business serving service-based industries including healthcare, real estate, and IT - Provide monthly bookkeeping, financial reporting, and tax support - Streamline processes to help clients focus on core operations



SBNG, P.C | Aug 2024 - Oct 2024 - Performed financial and compliance audits, client reviews, and data analysis - Maintained client relationships - Ensured AICPA standards - Provided insights through risk-based approaches



Cooper Norman Business Advisors & CPAs | Jan 2024 - April 2024 - Engaged in audits, reviews, and compilations of financial statements - Enhanced software capabilities using Practice CS Professional Suite, QuickBooks Online, and Excel - Developed audit analytical skills, applied GAAP & GAAS - Collaborated with team members and clients on complex projects



Brigham Young University-Idaho | Aug 2023 - Dec 2023 - Assisted professor for introductory SQL class - Taught classes in professor’s absence - Prepared and updated course materials - Graded assignments and provided student support



Walmart | May 2022 - May 2023 - Performed inventory checks and replenishment - Ensured product availability - Fulfilled online orders efficiently - Trained new employees, contributing to operational efficiency





Data Visualization
Data Wrangling
Basic Web App Development
Machine Learning
Accounting & Finance
Bookkeeping
Budgeting
Forecasting
Strong Communication
Leadership





Programming: R, Python, MySQL, HTML, Git, JAVA
Software: Microsoft Office Suite, Tableau, Power BI





Structured Query Language, MyEducator
Complete Guide to Power BI for Data Analysts, Microsoft Press
Certified Advanced QuickBooks ProAdvisor, Intuit






The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints | Oct 2024 - Present - Teach high school students early-morning seminary classes - Develop communication and leadership skills - Demonstrate commitment by engaging students before school



The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints | Aug 2019 - Aug 2021 - Demonstrated leadership in team training and goal achievement - Managed extensive workweeks up to 100 hours - Overcame pandemic challenges with creative problem-solving - Developed skills in meeting leadership and team support
